title: Bottomless Swamp (PILOT)
description:
When a teenage boy is abducted and knocked unconscious, he wakes to find himself chained up in a strange place. He sees a beautiful boy embracing a naked man and fears he's been kidnapped to be assaulted by a pervert, but his captor's true nature is shown when he grins, revealing a pair of fangs!

[i]This series was discontinued. The plot was overhauled and re-published on Bookcube under the same title.[/i]
